message.body: Are you coming to Feast at 7:30
Sleeping at Hannah's. see you in the morning!
8 or 9?
You mean at the Bechs ?
Yes
Please ask daddy too
Please be home by 8:30 so you can pack and have family breakfast before you go. The driver cannot wait for you. It will be a disaster if you are late. Love
I
Is this "I " like ali g ayyyy
Haha yes. Very sad about Zimmerman trial
I am just reading about it right now. I am very upset. Very. I hope there will be an uprising.
Me too
I thought we would sleep at the bech's but we ended up at tiuu's. can you pick me up from there?
Give me address
Ms mercury
213 cedar road Wallingford. Can you pick me up at 8:30?
K
Thank you!
Hellowwww
Well don't take a bad ride
What is going on??
Your dad and I are discussing our marriage
ARE YOU KIDDING ME YOU SENT ME AWAY TO HERSHEY PARK TO GET ME OUT OF YOUR WAY I HATE YOU
Your are a smart kid. I love you.
I HATE YOU THIS IS HELL FOR ME
I understand.
It is very painful for you.
daddy and I are going to talk about this with the boys TOGETHER. So please don't talk to them about it.
I hate you. This is the most depressing two days of my life
I feel sick and I hate everything and I'm going to have a panic attack
Why would you send me to someplace I hate for this
Why can't I be with my friends
I feel disgusting
The boys need you. You can be in touch with your friends until you get home and be in touch with them even more!!!!!!
It is normal for you to feel really bad.
My therapist says that my parents should never have put this burden on me and she is TOTALLY RIGHT YOU GUYS ARE COMPLETELY DESTROYING ME I DONT WANT TO BE HERE

Yes your therapist is very right. And I was trying to avoid this scenario (of you knowing some things ahead of time) but this is my first time doing this and I am doing it as well as I can. Sometimes things go against one's plans and wishes. I knew from the beginning that we should not burden you, but I was not always in control. I am very sorry that you are feeling angry.
I am really sorry.
I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU'RE NOT PICKING US UP UNTIL 6 TOMORROW. I THOUGHT WE WERE LEAVING AT LIKE 2. I CAN'T DO THIS.
THIS PLACE IS NOT FUN
IT REALLY UPSETS ME AND ALL I WANT IS TO BE WITH MY FRIENDS. YOU THOUGHT THAT YOU COULD JUST SEND US OFF AND I WOULDN'T REALIZE THAT IT'S A TRAP??
AT LEAST I GET TO RIDE ROLLERCOASTERS AND SCREAM AND PRETEND IM SCREAMING AT THE BOTH OF YOU BECAUSE YOU BOTH SUCK
Somebody is butt calling me from Kofi's phone
Good therapy
I HATE YOU WHY CAN'T YOU PICK US UP EARLIER
Because I have to go to a meeting.
